results.title: Metformin prevents BAFF activation of Erk1/2 from B-cell proliferation and survival by impeding mTOR-PTEN/Akt signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: Our findings support that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has a great potential for prevention of excessive @GENE_TNFSF13B @GENE_10673 @@@BAFF@@@-induced aggressive @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016393 @@@B-cell malignancies@@@ and @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen X, Ma J, Yao Y, Zhu J, Zhou Z, Zhao R, Dong X, Gao W, Zhang S, Huang S, Chen L. Metformin prevents BAFF activation of Erk1/2 from B-cell proliferation and survival by impeding mTOR-PTEN/Akt signaling pathway. Int Immunopharmacol. 2021 Jul;96():107771. PMID: 34004440
citations.BibTeX: @article{34004440, title={Metformin prevents BAFF activation of Erk1/2 from B-cell proliferation and survival by impeding mTOR-PTEN/Akt signaling pathway.}, author={Chen X and Ma J and Yao Y and Zhu J and Zhou Z and Zhao R and Dong X and Gao W and Zhang S and Huang S and Chen L}, journal={Int Immunopharmacol}, volume={96}, pages={107771}}

results.title: Metformin triggers apoptosis in PEL cells and alters bortezomib-induced Unfolded Protein Response increasing its cytotoxicity and inhibiting KSHV lytic cycle activation.
results.text_hl: In this study, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induced apoptosis in Primary Effusion @DISEASE_Lymphoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008223 @@@Lymphoma@@@ (@DISEASE_Lymphoma_Primary_Effusion @DISEASE_MESH:D054685 @@@PEL@@@) cells, an aggressive @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016393 @@@B cell lymphoma@@@ associated with KSHV against which the conventional therapies usually fail.

citations.NLM: Granato M, Gilardini Montani MS, Romeo MA, Santarelli R, Gonnella R, D'Orazi G, Faggioni A, Cirone M. Metformin triggers apoptosis in PEL cells and alters bortezomib-induced Unfolded Protein Response increasing its cytotoxicity and inhibiting KSHV lytic cycle activation. Cell Signal. 2017 Dec;40():239-247. PMID: 28964970
citations.BibTeX: @article{28964970, title={Metformin triggers apoptosis in PEL cells and alters bortezomib-induced Unfolded Protein Response increasing its cytotoxicity and inhibiting KSHV lytic cycle activation.}, author={Granato M and Gilardini Montani MS and Romeo MA and Santarelli R and Gonnella R and D'Orazi G and Faggioni A and Cirone M}, journal={Cell Signal}, volume={40}, pages={239-247}}

results.title: Therapeutic metformin/AMPK activation blocked lymphoma cell growth via inhibition of mTOR pathway and induction of autophagy
results.text_hl: @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activator @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ potentially inhibited the growth of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016393 @@@B- and T-lymphoma@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Shi WY, Xiao D, Wang L, Dong LH, Yan ZX, Shen ZX, Chen SJ, Chen Y, Zhao WL. Therapeutic metformin/AMPK activation blocked lymphoma cell growth via inhibition of mTOR pathway and induction of autophagy Cell Death Dis. 2012 Mar 1;3(3):e275. PMID: 22378068
